title: LoyceV
author: LoyceV
content: Someone asked me to look into github.com/Kixunil/btc-rpc-proxy, but I'm in over my head:Quote"I need to know how to send different different users to different wallets and how to forbid this users to payout in case they are getting hacked. All payouts are done locally by a script I wrote myself."Does anyone here have experience with btc-rpc-proxy?
